attributes.additional_details:
Since the first indy ref the lie is made of the promise that Scotlands only chance to remain in Europe was to remain in the UK. Today we're told fisheries and agriculture will return wholesale to Westminster on exit from Europe.
The constitutional changes against the wishes of the Scottish vote which predicated a second referendum in spite of the much vaunted "once in a lifetime" quote, have come to pass.
attributes.background:
Theresa May claims there is no appetite for a second independence referendum in Scotland. I say that is not true.
Lets find out.
